TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract DiagramNode implements class Microsoft.Office.Core._IMsoDispObj

summary.span: 代表图表中的节点。

span.span: Represents a node in a diagram.

span.para: 使用方法，以将节点添加到图表或图表顶点。
使用方法，以从图表或图表节点中删除一个节点。
若要返回DiagramNode对象，请使用以下项之一：

item.description: DiagramNode对象的， ， ，或方法或其属性
集合的或方法或或属性

span.para: A 图表节点可以终止，或它可以包含其他子图表，子图表节点或子形状。请参阅为以下这些：

item.description: 要引用的子图表，请使用属性。
要引用图示单个子节点，请使用AddNode、 CloneNode、 NextNode或PrevNode方法或根属性。
要引用图示子节点的集合，请使用属性。
要引用一个形状，请使用或属性。

span.para: Use the method to add a node to a diagram or to a diagram node.
Use the method to remove a node from a diagram or diagram node.
To return a DiagramNode object, use one of the following:

item.description: The DiagramNode object's , , , or methods or its property
The collection's or methods or or properties
The object's or collection's DiagramNode property

span.para: A diagram node can terminate, or it can contain other child diagrams, child diagram nodes, or child shapes. Refer to these with the following:

item.description: To refer to a child diagram, use the property.
To refer to an individual child diagram node, use the AddNode, CloneNode, NextNode or PrevNode methods or the Root property.
To refer to a collection of child diagram nodes, use the property.
To refer to a shape, use the or properties.

Public Function AddNode (Optional pos As MsoRelativeNodePosition = Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoRelativeNodePosition.msoAfterNode, Optional nodeType As MsoDiagramNodeType = Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoDiagramNodeType.msoDiagramNode) As DiagramNode

param.name: pos

span.span: Optional .

param.span: 其中将添加节点，相对于另一个节点。MsoRelativeNodePosition可以是下列常量之一：msoAfterLastSiblingmsoAfterNode默认msoBeforeFirstSiblingmsoBeforeNode

span.span: Where the node will be added, relative to another node.MsoRelativeNodePosition can be one of these constants:msoAfterLastSiblingmsoAfterNode DefaultmsoBeforeFirstSiblingmsoBeforeNode
Optional .
The type of node.
Can be one of these MsoDiagramNodeType constants:msoDiagramAssistantmsoDiagramNode Default

span.span: Creates a diagram node.

summary.span: 返回对象，表示新节点。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the new node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DiagramNode CloneNode([in]bool copyChildren, [in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DiagramNode pTargetNode, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoRelativeNodePosition pos) runtime managed
Public Function CloneNode (copyChildren As Boolean, pTargetNode As DiagramNode, Optional pos As MsoRelativeNodePosition = Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoRelativeNodePosition.msoAfterNode) As DiagramNode

param.name: copyChildren

span.span: Required Boolean.

param.span: True克隆以及图节点的子级。

span.span: True to clone the diagram node's children as well.

param.name: pTargetNode

span.span: Required DiagramNode object.

param.span: 该表达式返回一个DiagramNode对象，代表节点的新节点的放置位置。

span.span: An expression that returns a DiagramNode object that represents the node where the new node will be placed.

param.name: pos

span.span: Optional .

param.span: 如果指定时，指示将将节点添加相对于。MsoRelativeNodePosition可以是下列常量之一：msoAfterLastSiblingmsoAfterNode默认msoBeforeFirstSiblingmsoBeforeNode

span.span: If is specified, indicates where the node will be added relative to .MsoRelativeNodePosition can be one of these constants:msoAfterLastSiblingmsoAfterNode DefaultmsoBeforeFirstSiblingmsoBeforeNode

summary.span: 复制图表节点。

span.span: Clones a diagram node.

summary.span: 返回对象，代表克隆的节点。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

span.para: 如果对象在 Microsoft Excel 中创建的此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454 c。
Creator属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Excel 的创建者代码 XCEL。
If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.
The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Delete() runtime managed

summary.span: 删除对象。

span.span: Deletes the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Diagram As IMsoDiagram
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::IMsoDiagram ^ Diagram { Microsoft::Office::Core::IMsoDiagram ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回对象，它代表图表。

span.span: Returns a object representing a diagram.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoOrgChartLayoutType Layout { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoOrgChartLayoutType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoOrgChartLayoutType value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个常量，以指示组织结构图的子节点的格式。

span.span: Returns or sets a constant to indicate the formatting of the child nodes of an organization chart.

span.para: MsoOrgChartLayoutType可以是下列MsoOrgChartLayoutType常量之一。
为助手 msoOrgChartLayoutAssistant Places 子节点。
msoOrgChartLayoutBothHanging Places 子节点垂直从左侧和右侧的父节点。
msoOrgChartLayoutLeftHanging Places 子节点垂直从左侧的父节点。
msoOrgChartLayoutMixed父节点包含子使用多个MsoOrgChartLayoutType设置格式的返回值。
msoOrgChartLayoutRightHanging Places 子节点垂直从右侧的父节点。
msoOrgChartLayoutStandard Places 子节点水平的父节点之下。
MsoOrgChartLayoutType can be one of these MsoOrgChartLayoutType constants.
msoOrgChartLayoutAssistant Places child nodes as assistants.
msoOrgChartLayoutBothHanging Places child nodes vertically from the parent node on both the left and the right side.
msoOrgChartLayoutLeftHanging Places child nodes vertically from the parent node on the left side.
msoOrgChartLayoutMixed Return value for a parent node that has children formatted using more than one MsoOrgChartLayoutType.
msoOrgChartLayoutRightHanging Places child nodes vertically from the parent node on the right side.
msoOrgChartLayoutStandard Places child nodes horizontally below the parent node.

span.span: The position to move the node, relative to .MsoRelativeNodePosition can be one of these constants:msoAfterLastSiblingmsoAfterNodemsoBeforeFirstSiblingmsoBeforeNode

summary.span: 移动图表节点和任何图表中及其子节点。

span.span: Moves a diagram node and any of its child nodes within a diagram.

summary.span: 返回对象，表示图表节点集合中的上一图表节点。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the previous diagram node in a collection of diagram nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReplaceNode([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DiagramNode pTargetNode) runtime managed

span.span: Required object.
The target diagram node to be replaced.

summary.span: 目标图示节点替换为源图表顶点。

span.span: Replaces a target diagram node with the source diagram node.

span.para: 目标图示节点被删除，并将源图表节点，包括任何子节点，移动到目标图节点所在。
The target diagram node is deleted, and the source diagram node, including any of its child nodes, are moved to where the target diagram node was.

summary.span: 返回根根图表节点所属的对象。

span.span: Returns the root object which the root diagram node belongs.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SwapNode (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DiagramNode pTargetNode, bool swapChildren = false);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SwapNode([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DiagramNode pTargetNode, [in]bool swapChildren) runtime managed
Public Sub SwapNode (pTargetNode As DiagramNode, Optional swapChildren As Boolean = false)

span.span: Required object.
The target diagram node to be replaced.

param.name: swapChildren

span.span: Optional Boolean.

param.span: 目标和源节点被交换的子节点。

span.span: The child nodes of the target and source nodes being swapped.

param.span: 关系图的任何子节点移以及相应的根节点。

span.span: Any child diagram nodes are moved along with their corresponding root nodes.

param.span: 默认值为True，这交换子节点。

span.span: Default is True, which swaps the child nodes.

summary.span: 交换源图节点与目标图示节点。

span.span: Swaps the source diagram node with a target diagram node.
